p: This study was approved by the ethical committee and the samples were carried out following the rules and laws that govern the use of human material in Thailand. The study protocol was approved by the Ethical Committees of the Faculty of Tropical Medicine, Mahidol University (Bangkok, Thailand) (approval No. MUTM 2016-002-01), the Faculty of Medicine of Prince of Songkhla University and Hat Yai Hospital (Songkhla, Thailand) (approval No. 59-159-05-2). Informed consent was obtained from study participants and for minors from parents or a legal representative.
